cutvector.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 subroutine cutvector(r_in, face_nr, n, r_out, &
00002         geometry, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, centre )
00003     !
00004     ! cuts a vector on the face face_nr
00005     ! and optionally puts out thr normal vector
00006     !
00007 
00008     implicit none
00009     
00010     real*8, dimension(1:3), intent(in)  :: r_in
00011     real*8, dimension(1:3), intent(out) :: n, r_out
00012     real*8, dimension(1:3)              :: r_affin, temp
00013     integer, intent(in)               :: face_nr
00014     integer, intent(in)               :: geometry
00015     real, intent(in) :: x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere
00016     real, intent(in) ::  centre(3)
00017 
00018     real*8, dimension(1:3, 1:3)       :: T
00019     real*8                              :: c_status, phi, psi, gamma
00020 
00021     r_affin = r_in - centre
00022     select case (geometry) 
00023     case (0) ! slab
00024         select case (face_nr)
00025         case (1, 2) ! x-y-planes
00026             n = (/0., 0., 1./)
00027             if (face_nr == 2) n = -n
00028             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00029         case (3, 4) ! x-z-planes
00030             n = (/0., 1., 0./)
00031             if (face_nr == 4) n = -n
00032             r_affin = .5 * y_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00033         case (5, 6) ! y-z-planes
00034             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00035             if (face_nr == 6) n = -n
00036             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00037         end select
00038         r_out = r_affin + centre
00039         
00040     case (1) ! sphere
00041         n = - r_affin / sqrt(dot_product(r_affin, r_affin))
00042         r_out = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n)) + centre
00043         
00044     case (2) ! disc
00045         select case (face_nr)
00046         case (1) ! zylinder
00047             n = (/0.d0, -r_affin(2), -r_affin(3)/)
00048             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00049             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00050         case (2, 3) ! y-z-planes
00051             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00052             if (face_nr == 3) n = -n
00053             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00054         end select
00055         r_out = r_affin + centre
00056         
00057     case (3) ! wire
00058         select case (face_nr)
00059         case (1) ! zylinder
00060             n = (/-r_affin(1), -r_affin(2), 0.d0/)
00061             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00062             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00063         case (2, 3) ! x-y-planes
00064             n = (/0., 0., 1./)
00065             if (face_nr == 3) n = -n
00066             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00067         end select
00068         r_out = r_affin + centre
00069         
00070     case (4) ! ellipsoid
00071         T = reshape((/1., 0., 0., 0., x_plasma / y_plasma, 0., 0., 0., x_plasma / z_plasma/), (/3, 3/))
00072         temp = matmul(T, r_affin)
00073         r_out = r_sphere * x_plasma * r_affin / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp))
00074         temp = r_sphere * x_plasma * temp / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp))
00075         phi = atan(temp(1) / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp) - temp(1)**2))
00076         psi = atan(temp(1) * sqrt(dot_product(r_out, r_out) - temp(1)**2) / (dot_product(temp, temp) - temp(1)**2))
00077         phi = phi - psi
00078         call rotate(phi, temp, n)
00079         n = -n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00080         r_out = r_out + centre
00081         
00082     case (5) ! prism
00083         gamma = atan(y_plasma / (2 * x_plasma))
00084         select case (face_nr)
00085         case (1, 2) ! x-y-planes
00086             n = (/0., 0.,-1./)
00087             if (face_nr == 2) n = -n
00088             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00089         case (3) ! y-z-plane
00090             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00091             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00092         case (4, 5) ! the other planes
00093             n = (/-sin(gamma), +cos(gamma),0.d0/)
00094             r_affin(2) = tan(gamma) * r_affin(1) - y_plasma / 4.
00095             if (face_nr == 5) then
00096                 n(2) = -n(2)
00097                 r_affin(2) = -r_affin(2)
00098             end if
00099         end select
00100         r_out = r_affin + centre
00101         
00102     case (6) ! semisphere
00103         temp = r_affin - (/-r_sphere / 2.d0, 0.d0, 0.d0/)
00104         select case (face_nr)
00105         case (1) ! semisphere
00106             n = -temp
00107             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00108             r_affin = r_sphere * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2.d0, 0.d0, 0.d0/)
00109         case (2) ! plane
00110             n = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00111             r_affin = .5 * r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00112         end select
00113         r_out = r_affin + centre
00114         
00115     case (7) ! hollow ball
00116         select case (face_nr)
00117         case (1) ! outer sphere
00118             n = -r_affin
00119             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00120             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00121         case (2) ! inner sphere
00122             n = r_affin
00123             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00124             r_affin = (r_sphere - x_plasma) * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00125         end select
00126         r_out = r_affin + centre
00127         
00128     case (8) ! hollow semisphere
00129         temp = r_affin - (/-r_sphere / 2.d0, 0.d0, 0.d0/)
00130         select case (face_nr)
00131         case (1) ! outer semisphere
00132             n = -temp
00133             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00134             r_affin = r_sphere * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00135         case (2) ! inner semisphere
00136             n = temp
00137             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00138             r_affin = (r_sphere - x_plasma) * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00139         case (3) ! y-z-plane
00140             n = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00141             r_affin = .5 * r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00142         end select
00143         r_out = r_affin + centre
00144         
00145     end select
00146     
00147 contains
00148 
00149     !
00150     ! Rotates a vector around the y-axis
00151     ! with an angle phi (needed for the 
00152     ! ellipsoid)
00153     !
00154     subroutine rotate(phi, v_in, v_out)
00155         real*8                          :: phi
00156         real*8, dimension(1:3)          :: v_in, v_out
00157         real*8                          :: c, s
00158         real*8, dimension(1:3, 1:3)     :: R
00159 
00160         c = cos(phi)
00161         s = sin(phi)
00162 
00163         R = reshape((/1.d0, 0.d0, 0.d0, 0.d0, c, s, 0.d0, -s, c/), (/3, 3/))
00164         v_out = matmul(R, v_in)
00165     end subroutine rotate
00166 
00167 end subroutine cutvector
